mapper.insert: INSERT INTO edu_exam ( examId, courseId, paperId, examname, examStartTime, examEndTime, totalTime, examExplain, joinYear, grade, term, major, createTime, updateTime, reserve1, reserve2) VALUES (#{examId}, #{courseId}, #{paperId}, #{examname}, #{examStartTime}, #{examEndTime}, #{totalTime}, #{examExplain}, #{joinYear}, #{grade} , #{term}, #{major}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{reserve1}, #{reserve2})
mapper.update: UPDATE updateChapter SET examId=#{examId}, courseId=#{courseId}, paperId=#{paperId}, examname=#{examname}, examStartTime=#{examStartTime}, examEndTime=#{examEndTime},totalTime=#{totalTime}, examExplain=#{examExplain}, joinYear=#{joinYear}, grade=#{grade} ,term=#{term}, major=#{major}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateTime=#{updateTime} , reserve1=#{reserve1}, reserve2=#{reserve2} where examId=#{examId}
